title: Executive Order 5915-Power-Site Restoration No. 470, California
content: So much of Executive order of January 14, 1915, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 471, as affects the lands hereinafter described is hereby revoked:
T. 15 S., R. 28 E., sec. 21, N. ½ SE. ¼, SE. ¼ SE. ¼;
sec. 28, NE. ¼ E. ½ NW. ¼.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5915-Power-Site Restoration No. 470, California Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361494
